tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE samples (
  sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sample_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  collection_date DATE,
  sample_type VARCHAR(20),
  storage_location VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE samples (
  sample_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  sample_name STRING,
  organism STRING,
  collection_date DATE,
  location STRING
);

CREATE TABLE experiments (
  experiment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  sample_id UUID,
  experiment_type STRING,
  start_date TIMESTAMP,
  end_date TIMESTAMP,
  result TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (sample_id) REFERENCES samples(sample_id)
);

CREATE TABLE sample_measurements (
    measurement_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    sample_id UUID REFERENCES sample_metadata(sample_id),
    measurement_type VARCHAR,
    measurement_value FLOAT,
    measurement_unit VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE sample_metadata(
  metadata_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sample_id INT,
  metadata_key TEXT,
  metadata_value TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (sample_id) REFERENCES sample_info(sample_id)
);

CREATE TABLE sample_results(
  result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sample_id INT,
  result_data TEXT,
  result_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (sample_id) REFERENCES sample_info(sample_id)
);

CREATE TABLE sample_analysis(
  analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  result_id INT,
  analysis_type TEXT,
  analysis_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (result_id) REFERENCES sample_results(result_id)
);
CREATE TABLE samples ( sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sample_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, organism_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, collection_date DATE, created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT NOW() )
CREATE TABLE researchers ( researcher_id INT PRIMARY KEY, researcher_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE, organization VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL )
CREATE TABLE experiments ( experiment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, experiment_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, description TEXT, start_date DATE, end_date DATE )

CREATE TABLE measurements ( measurement_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sample_id INT, experiment_id INT, measurement_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, value FLOAT NOT NULL, measurement_date DATE, FOREIGN KEY (sample_id) REFERENCES samples(sample_id), FOREIGN KEY (experiment_id) REFERENCES experiments(experiment_id) )

CREATE TABLE results ( result_id INT PRIMARY KEY, measurement_id INT, researcher_id INT, result_description TEXT, result_date DATE, FOREIGN KEY (measurement_id) REFERENCES measurements(measurement_id), FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id) REFERENCES researchers(researcher_id) )
